testcase.name: disabled item still has valid shouldScheduleOnDate
disabled items are skipped in settings filtering
YEARLY schedules on leap day (Feb 29)
enabled item with DAILY mode and interval schedules correctly
exact times can be sorted by time of day
isEnabled defaults to false
notificationCount can be decreased to 1
YEARLY with null month returns false
enabling preserves existing intervalStartDateMillis
MONTHLY_BY_DATE with last working day mode
DAILY mode with interval and no intervalStartDateMillis uses today as start
getRandomTexts with count 2 has bullet prefix and no comma
toggling isEnabled preserves all other fields
normalizeToStartOfDay strips time component
MONTHLY_BY_WEEKDAY schedules on last Sunday of month
DATE_RANGE with null start returns false
DATE_RANGE schedules within range
DATE_RANGE with null end returns false
MONTHLY_BY_WEEKDAY schedules on fourth Thursday of month
getRandomTexts with count 3 has bullets and no commas
getRandomTexts with count 1 returns single text no comma no bullet
ExactTime data class creates correctly
WEEKLY mode schedules on selected day of week
MONTHLY_BY_WEEKDAY with null weekday returns false
YEARLY schedules on New Year
DAILY mode with interval 3 schedules every 3 days
MONTHLY_BY_DATE schedules on selected day of month
deserialization of old JSON without new fields uses defaults
notificationCount change preserves other fields
default NotificationItem has useExactTime false
updating exact time at specific index works
notificationCount minimum is 1 (UI constraint)
full scenario - create enable change count disable
WEEKLY mode schedules on multiple selected days
DATE_RANGE does not schedule outside range
exact times convert to minutes correctly
getRandomText returns the only text when list has one item
notificationCount defaults to 1
WEEKLY mode with empty selectedWeekDays returns false
textsPerNotification cannot exceed text list size
DAILY mode with interval 1 always schedules
adding texts does not auto-increase textsPerNotification
multiple exact times in one minute are allowed
MONTHLY_BY_WEEKDAY schedules on third Wednesday of month
getRandomTexts all texts are unique
MONTHLY_BY_WEEKDAY schedules on first Monday of month
serialization round trip preserves all fields
notificationCount maximum is 50 (UI constraint)
switching from exact time to random preserves time range
textsPerNotification is clamped when text is removed
no enabled items means nothing to schedule
MONTHLY_BY_DATE with empty selectedMonthDays returns false
DATE_RANGE single day range works
DAILY mode with interval before start date does not fire
SPECIFIC_DATE normalizes time part of specificDateMillis
MONTHLY_BY_DATE schedules on multiple selected days
textsPerNotification stays same when text removed but still within range
MONTHLY_BY_DATE with workingDaysOnly but null position returns false
getRandomTexts clamps count to list size
textsPerNotification clamps down to 1 when all but one text removed
getRandomText returns one of the texts
WEEKLY mode schedules on Sunday (day 7)
exact times with same hour are sorted by minute
NotificationItem can be created with exact times
MONTHLY_BY_WEEKDAY schedules on second Friday of month
notificationCount zero returns 0 from time range calculation
